explanation: Funds are required to procure "prime mover" vehicles for the Integrated Battle Command System (IBCS). Seven (7) M1086A2 and eighteen (18) M1085A2 Family of Medium Tactical Vehicle (FMTV) trucks are required. The prime mover solution vehicles will be provided to the IBCS contractor as Government Furnished Equipment for the Low Rate Initial Production (LRIP)/Full-Rate Production (FRP) IBCS configuration. These FMTV's support several different IBCS Major End Items (MEIs), including Engagement Operation Centers (EOC's), Integrated Collaborative Environments (ICE's), and Integrated Fire Control Network (IFCN) Relays required to field an Air and Missile Defense Battalion. During an IBCS Limited User Test (LUT), transportability and mobility issues were identified, requiring the Army to utilize different prime movers that were not part of the original program plan. This is a base budget requirement.

Funds were intended for equipment replacement at Offutt Air Force Base, for the 2019 flood recovery. Due to data entry errors, this requirement was not correctly justified in the 2021 President's Budget request. Funds for Offutt equipment replacement cannot be executed as an Air Force Physical Security System requirement in Other Procurement, Air Force. The reprogramming action realigns the funds to the correct budget program activity code within the appropriation. This is base budget funding.
